caption.title: Essential oil content in fibrous roots of A. heterotropoides var. mandshuricum plants grown in different light irradiations.
caption.p: Note: I, 100% full sunlight; II, 50% full sunlight; III, 24% full sunlight; IV, 12% full sunlight. Error bar represents standard deviation (n = 5); different letters on the bars mean significant difference ( P <0.05).
